site_name: Notting Hill And Ealing High School
description: Details of energy strategy pursuant to 9 of planning permission Ref PP/2011/0245 dated 17/08/2011 for construction of a replacement six storey extension (including two storeys underground plus a part underground mezzanine and detailed as basement, basement mezzanine and lower ground floor levels) comprising of basement four court sports hall, basement mezzanine ancillary storage/plant room, lower ground floor level changing facilities, double-height assembly hall ground/first floor, ground floor back stage area and drama studio, foyer, workshop and dance studio, first floor level locker room, and second floor level dance studio (following the demolition of the existing gymnasium, stair, link bridge, stores, toilets, raised stage and assembly hall); and construction of single storey temporary accommodation comprising assembly space, classrooms and toilet facilities
